context.p: Users who log on with the SAML Identity Provider user account can choose to complete the Single Sign-On (SSO) configuration, which allows to access multiple applications and services using a single set of login credentials.

step.cmd: Log on to the web console using an account with the Admin role.

li.p: The logon credentials entered here are case-sensitive.

step.cmd: Click the Download button to download the StellarOne metadata XML file
Upload the StellarOne metadata XML file to your IdP, and then download the IdP metadata XML file.
Click the Upload button to upload the IdP metadata XML file to StellarOne web console to complete the SAML 2.0 single sign-on configuration.

note.p: The IdP metadata XML file must be re-uploaded if there is a configuration change on the IdP.

step.cmd: After the IdP metadata XML file is uploaded, the Test Connection button will appear.
Click the Test Connection button to test the IdP connection with StellarOne.

note.p: Invalid logon error message may appear after the SAML configuration is completed. Please refer to to check email setting in IdP server, and system time synchronization in IdP and StellarOne servers.
